module.name: Boss-Secretary
module.description: Module to manage the call flow between Boss and Secretary, with a whitelist.
module.changelog: *14.0.4* - Replaced unsupported "unique" column option with a proper unique index for compatibility with FreePBX 17. Backward compatibility with FreePBX 14 confirmed. *14.0.3* - Resolved an issue in the generated dialplan where the ${CS_RESULT} variable was incorrectly escaped in the GotoIf condition. *14.0.2* - Added validation to prevent duplicate boss extensions. *14.0.1* - Initial version of the module.
